vectorize.resources.creating_vector_inde: Learn how to create indexes using the Wrangler CLI
Insert data vectors to an index
Learn how to insert data into an index using the Wrangler CLI
vectorize.overview.title: Vectorize
vectorize.overview.description: Build full-stack AI applications with Vectorize, Cloudflare's powerful vector database. Combine it with Workers AI to store and query embeddings, or bring-your-own embeddings to Vectorize.
vectorize.welcome.title: Welcome to Vectorize
vectorize.wrangler_tutorial.create_vecto: To create your first index, <0>install the Wrangler CLI</0> and run the following command, specifying the dimensions and distance metric based on the shape of the vectors you will insert:
vectorize.wrangler_tutorial.bind_to_work: To bind your index to a Worker so that you can start querying it, copy the following binding into the wrangler.toml file of your Workers project:
